name: Big Changes in the Aurelia Router 1.5.0 Release
description: I'm excited to announce that thanks to the hard work of Aurelia contributor Jürgen Wenzel [http://github.com/jwx] the Aurelia router has just gotten a lot more powerful. In addition to a quick overview of the new features, we're going to look at an example of how to use these features to create the perfect master-detail page.
